GV05isup___u:0: īśā vāsyam idaṃ sarvaṃ yat kiñca jagatyāṃ jagat |
GV05isup___u:1: tena tyaktena bhuñjīthā mā gṛdhaḥ kasya sviddhanam || IsUp_1 ||
GV05isup___u:3: evaṃ tvayi nānyatheto 'sti na karma lipyate nare || IsUp_2 ||
GV05isup___u:4: asuryā nāma te lokā andhena tamasāvṛtāḥ |
GV05isup___u:5: tāṃste pretyābhigacchanti ye ke cātmahano janāḥ || IsUp_3 ||
GV05isup___u:6: anejad ekaṃ manaso javīyo nainaddevā āpnuvanpūrvamarṣat |
GV05isup___u:7: taddhāvato 'nyānatyeti tiṣṭhat tasminn apo mātariśvā dadhāti || IsUp_4 ||
GV05isup___u:8: tad ejati tan naijati tad dūre tad v antike |
GV05isup___u:9: tad antar asya sarvasya tad u sarvasyāsya bāhyataḥ || IsUp_5 ||
GV05isup___u:10: yas tu sarvāṇi bhūtāny ātmany evānupaśyati |
GV05isup___u:11: sarvabhūteṣu cātmānaṃ tato na vijugupsate || IsUp_6 ||
GV05isup___u:13: tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvam anupaśyataḥ || IsUp_7 ||
GV05isup___u:14: sa paryagāc chukram akāyam avraṇam asnāviraṃ śuddham apāpaviddham /
GV05isup___u:15: kavir manīṣī paribhūḥ syayambhūr yāthātathyator 'thān vyadadhāc chāśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ || IsUp_8 ||
GV05isup___u:17: tato bhūya iva te tamo ya uvidyāyāṃ ratāḥ || IsUp_9 ||
GV05isup___u:18: anyad evāhur vidyayān yad āhur avidyayā |
GV05isup___u:19: iti śuśruma dhīrāṇāṃ ye nas tad vicacakṣire || IsUp_10 ||
GV05isup___u:20: vidyāṃ cāvidyāṃ ca yas tad vedobhayaṃ saha |
GV05isup___u:21: avidyayā mṛtyuṃ tīrtvā vidyayāmṛtam aśnute || IsUp_11 ||
GV05isup___u:23: tato bhūya iva te tamo ya u sambhūtyāṃ ratāḥ || IsUp_12 ||
GV05isup___u:24: anyad evāhuḥ saṃbhavād anyad āhur asaṃbhavāt |
GV05isup___u:25: iti śuśruma dhīrāṇāṃ ye nas tad vicacakṣire || IsUp_13 ||
GV05isup___u:26: saṃbhūtiṃ ca vināśaṃ ca yas tad vedobhayaṃ saha |
GV05isup___u:27: vināśena mṛtyuṃ tīrtvā saṃbhūtyāmṛtam aśnute || IsUp_14 ||
GV05isup___u:29: tat tvaṃ pūṣann apāvṛṇu satyadharmāya dṛṣṭaye || IsUp_15 ||
GV05isup___u:30: pūṣann ekarṣe yama sūrya prājāpatya vyūha raśmīn samūha tejaḥ |
GV05isup___u:31: yat te rūpaṃ kalyāṇatamaṃ tat te paśyāmi yo 'sāv asau puruṣaḥ so 'ham asmi
GV05isup___u:32: vāyur anilam amṛtam athedaṃ bhasmāntaṃ śarīram |
GV05isup___u:33: oṃ krato smara kṛtaṃ smara krato smara kṛtaṃ smara || IsUp_17 ||
GV05isup___u:34: agne naya supathā rāye asmān viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān |
GV05isup___u:35: yuyodhy asmaj juhurāṇam eno bhūyiṣṭhāṃ te nama uktiṃ vidhema || IsUp_18 ||
